channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta hires former Trump advisor Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chair
item.description: Before joining Meta, Powell McCormick was working as deputy national security advisor to President Donald Trump.

item.title: Luminar lines up $22 million bidder for its lidar business
item.description: The bid comes from Quantum Computing Inc., which already lined up to buy Luminar's semiconductor division. Luminar founder Austin Russell has also exp...

item.title: Harmattan AI raises $200M Series B led by Dassault Aviation, becomes defense unicorn
item.description: French defense tech company Harmattan AI is now valued at $1.4 billion after raising a $200 million Series B round led by Dassault Aviation, which is ...

item.title: Hyte X50 PC Case Review: Computers Should Be Cute
item.description: Hyte’s rounded glass case brings a fun, bubbly aesthetic to your desk.

item.title: 10 Best Pet Cameras (2026), Tested With Our Pets
item.description: Whether you’re near or far, keep an eye on your fur baby with our favorite pet cameras.

item.title: inDrive turns to ads and groceries to diversify revenue
item.description: Advertising on inDrive is being rolled out across its top 20 markets following mid-2025 tests.

item.title: Best Travel Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve found the best travel cameras—from point-and-shoot to full-frame—to help you bring home the perfect vacation photos.

item.title: These Gen Zers just raised $11.75M to put Africa’s defense back in the hands of Africans
item.description: African defense company Terra comes out of stealth with a $11.75M round led by Joe Lonsdale's 8VC.

item.title: 16 Best Heat Protectant Sprays for Wet and Dry Hair (2026)
item.description: I've spent almost a year testing dozens of heat protectants for hair. Whether you’re blow-drying, curling, or straightening, these are the best formul...

item.title: Bluesound Pulse Cinema Review: A Pretty Sonos Alternative
item.description: This is a promising stand-alone Dolby Atmos soundbar for music fans, but it still needs a few software tweaks.
